Funny thing is: you are both kinda correct.

The term "kite mage" as an own subclass doesn't exist right now, instead it is actually a subsubclass.

Kite mages are a special form of burst mages, which are trading burst power for mobility and therefore the ability to kite efficiently.

Ahri is less supposed to oneshot like Syndra or Veigar, instead she is supposed to use a hit and run playstyle. Unload your combo on a target to deal damage, kite back and wait for another rotation and finish the enemy that way.

Meanwhile Veigar and Syndra use a single combo to burst squishy targets immediately.

TL,DR: Kite mages are a category of burst mages with more mobility, but less damage.
